indications:

failure
name: ISOSORBIDE DINITRATE Modified-release preparations
breadcrumbs: 2.6 Nitrates, calcium-channel blockers, and other antianginal drugs
doses:
By mouth, daily in divided doses, angina
30–120 mg, left ventricular failure 40–160 mg, up to 240 mg if required

By intravenous infusion, 2–10 mg/hour; higher
doses up to 20 mg/hour may be required
